Class ComponentTile

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.it.galaxytrucker.model.componenttiles.ComponentTile
Direct Known Subclasses:
BatteryComponent, CargoHold, CentralCabin, LifeSupport, OutOfBoundsTile, Shield, SingleCannon, SingleEngine, StructuralModule
public abstract class ComponentTile extends Object
This abstract class represents a component tile. Component tiles are the basic building blocks of a spaceship, each with four edges that can be rotated to connect with other tiles.
Version:
1.2
Author:
Giacomo Amaducci

    Constructs a new component tile with the specified edges.

  • Constructor Details

    • ComponentTile

      public ComponentTile(List<TileEdge> edges, String graphicPath)
      Constructs a new component tile with the specified edges. The Initial rotation is set to 0.
      Parameters:
      edges - the edges for the Component Tile must contain exactly four elements.

  • Method Details

    • rotate

      public void rotate()
      Rotates the tile clockwise by 90 degrees. The rotation is limited to 4 possible positions (0, 1, 2, 3) by using modulo 4.

    • getRotation

      public int getRotation()
      Returns the current rotation of the tile.
      Returns:
      an int between 0 and 3 which indicates the current rotation.

    • getGraphicPath

      public String getGraphicPath()
      Returns the path to the specific graphic for this component tile.

      The presence of the image is not guaranteed, if the usage requires it to be non-null, the caller should use Objects.requireNonNull().

      Returns:
      A String representing the path to an image in the resource folder.

    • getTileEdges

      public List<TileEdge> getTileEdges()
      Returns the 4 edges of the tile, accounting for the tile's rotation.

      The edges are reordered based on the rotation value by splitting the list at the index tileEdges.size() - rotation and swapping the two parts.

      Returns:
      a List<TileEdge> representing the edges in their rotated order.
